thread.title: BRIEF-First Bank Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.23

title: BRIEF-First Bank Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.23
text:
April 23, 2018 / 8:41 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-First Bank Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.23 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  First Bank: 
* REPORTS FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 NET INCOME OF $4.0 MILLION, UP $2.1 MILLION COMPARED TO FIRST QUARTER OF 2017 * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.23 EXCLUDING ITEMS 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.23 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q1 REVENUE $13.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $12.6 MILLION 
* NET INTEREST INCOME FOR Q1 OF 2018 WAS $12.6 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF $4.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
